note: Pyro Equity is a private equity firm that originally started in California and currently has multiple offices in California and Texas. Founded by serial technology entrepreneurs Justin Rath and Matthew Iommi, Pyro Equity invests in start-up businesses and early-stage companies that show high growth potential. With its highly skilled team developers, marketers, operational managers, and more, Pyro Equity seeks to help the businesses that strive to be different.
